active_incidents.title: Issues with posting permissions for threads

notes.body: We’re nearing a fix for this issue. Functionality is almost back to normal, but we’re still working towards a full resolution. We’ll be back with another update as soon as we can confirm the issue is resolved.

This issue is isolated to our desktop applications and browsers. Mobile applications are unaffected.
Our next update will be at 10:00 a.m. PDT.

Some customers may be experiencing issues with the 'Allow threads' option for channels where message posting is restricted to Admins only. We're very sorry for the disruption. We are investigating and we will provide another update as soon as we have more information to share.
